name: my-compiler
description: A package to compile other packages out there.
author: Aakash

scripts.build-react-hfn-components: rimraf ../react-hfn-components/dist/hfn-gatsby && yarn --cwd ../react-hfn-components build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel ../react-hfn-gatsby-components/src --out-dir ../react-hfn-components/dist/hfn-gatsby --ignore __tests__,spec.js,'../react-hfn-gatsby-components/**/test.js','../react-hfn-gatsby-components/src/**/*.stories.js','../react-hfn-gatsby-components/__snapshots__'
